comments.author: wlachance@mozilla.com
comments.text:
We submit the environment has part of a heartbeat ping: https://searchfox.org/mozilla-central/rev/2cd2d511c0d94a34fb7fa3b746f54170ee759e35/toolkit/components/normandy/lib/Heartbeat.jsm#344

... but it is not included in the ping:

https://github.com/mozilla-services/mozilla-pipeline-schemas/blob/688ca250e180f9a5de911a4fc5957a7491e5e98c/templates/telemetry/heartbeat/heartbeat.4.schema.json

So the data just goes to additional_properties.
